column4: hi, i tried to accosiate .m3u files to xmms and now alot of other files i am clicking on is opened with xmms like txt and log files ... anyone can help ?
just rightclick the file and check properties.
you can modify with what app to open that associated file there
you can have multiple apps and just rightclick and Open With App X or Open With App Y
Tristan, i am on the traditional xchat now
Tristan, well xchat-gnome has no smilies in ubuntu
it worked... thanks ! :) one more question can it it be dangerus to use other peoples .deb files .. i meen if they baked in some malware ? or is it better to compile self ?
no problem. Yes, that could be possible, although not very likely. Always check if the source is reliable (such as with the official reopsitories)
yes I agree with what the people said before me
no system is safe. Sadly, this is the truth.
